metadata.purpose: Caching and task orchestration for monorepo
Fast Chrome Extension development with HMR
metadata.mv3_compliance: CRXJS plugin handles Manifest V3 CSP

metadata.description: Centralized dynamic context menu management. Handles Save Chat, Create Prompt, and Inject Prompt menus uniformly to prevent race conditions.
Robust prompt synchronization manager. handles fetch/cache logic, auto-login redirects for 401s, and network error handling.
Centralized platform adapter engine. v2.1.2 adds passive Org ID sniffing for Claude and direct 'My Chats' saving for all platforms.
React 18 popup UI with glassmorphism design. v2.1.2 features auto-login flow and streamlined UX.

features.header: Settings button opens dashboard, Theme toggle with persistence
features.statusbar: Real-time auth sync with error handling
features.debugging: Console logging for auth and theme operations
